channel.title: Projects on Melu-Akekue Barinatamkee
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Melu-Akekue Barinatamkee

item.title: Project V: Restaurant Sales Forecast
item.description: The program uses RandomForestRegressor, a machine learning regressor for training the data and forecasting the future sales The tool returns the expected sales for the date range selected and the weather conditions of the period. Link to github repo

item.title: Project IV: Oklohoma Weather Analysis
item.description: This is a detailed analysis of the weather conditions in different sites in Oklohoma. Regression models which show the continous characteristic of the different weather conditions Link to github repo

item.title: Project III: Customer Insurance Settlement
item.description: This model predicts if a customer’s insurance will be settled or not. The following classification models are used: ** Logistic Regression ** Support Vector Machines ** Decision Tree ** KNN Link to github repo

item.title: Project II: NBA Players Stats Explorer
item.description: This web app performs webscraping of NBA player stats data The data source is Basketball-reference.com Filtered CSV file can be downloaded The correlation between the different stat categories is displayed Link to the webapp Link to github repo

item.title: Project I: Winning Space Race with Data Science
item.description: SpaceX advertises Falcon 9 rocket launches on its website, with a cost of 62 million dollars; others providers cost upward of 165 million dollars each, much of the savings is because SpaceX can reuse the first stage. The project task is to predict if the first stage of the SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket will land successfully. The following datasets was collected: ** SpaceX launch data that is gathered from the SpaceX REST API.
